mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FUNDING ORDER BY FNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FUNDING ( FNO, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, POINT, DIST, FUNDING_FICTURE, FUNDING_LIKE, VIEWCNT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( FUNDING_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{point}, #{dist}, #{fundingFicture}, 0, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE FUNDING SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, POINT = #{point}, DIST = #{dist}, FUNDING_FICTURE = #{fundingFicture}, UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE FNO = #{fno}
UPDATE FUNDING SET VIEWCNT = VIEWCNT + 1 WHERE FNO = #{fno}
UPDATE FUNDING SET FUNDING_LIKE = FUNDING_LIKE + 1 WHERE FNO = #{fno}
UPDATE FUNDING SET FUNDING_LIKE = FUNDING_LIKE - 1 WHERE FNO = #{fno}
